name: Hands-on-Portal Support
description: This Webble handles and manages all Hand-on-Portal specific tasks, that is not technically required or needed by the Digital Dashboard, but is needed and required by the Hands-on-Portal environment. It is not useful for much else though, so if not within HoP environnment this Webble is basically only useful if you need to develop a similar Webble for your environment and need a hint or two.
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
